text: Righeira were an Italian Italo disco duo, started in Turin, Italy in 1983. The members were Stefano Righi and Stefano Rota. == Albums == * Righeira (1983) * Bambini Forever (1986) * Uno, Zero, Centomila (1992) * Mondovisione (2007) == Compilations == * Righeira '83-'85 (1985) * Vamos a la playa (1989) * Greatest Hits (2002) * The Best (2002) Category:1983 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Italy
title: Righeira
